law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 67, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2) and (3). -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Purchases under fifty dollars -- Petty cash account.
